meanings.sent2: Johannes is a common name in some countries.
meanings.sent3: Johannes always gets confused when someone mispronounces his name.
meanings.sent4: The name Johannes carries a sense of tradition and history.
meanings.sent5: When you hear the name Johannes, you immediately think of a friendly person.

meanings.definition: Johannes: a unit of currency in South Africa.
meanings.sent1: I need to exchange my dollars for Johannes.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item is 10 Johannes.
meanings.sent3: I found a lucky Johannes coin on the street.
meanings.sent4: In South Africa, the value of Johannes fluctuates.
meanings.sent5: Carrying Johannes in my wallet makes me feel like a local.

meanings.definition: Johannes: a type of printing press.
meanings.sent1: The publishing house uses a Johannes for their books.
meanings.sent2: The Johannes revolutionized the printing industry.
meanings.sent3: The Johannes in the office is always breaking down.
meanings.sent4: The Johannes hums quietly as it prints each page.
meanings.sent5: The Johannes is a marvel of engineering and efficiency.
